divs: Sighting DetailsEvery day I walk around my horse pasture (5 acres) with my dog. There is always lots of air traffic almost every day. I carry my camera with me and take pictures when things look interesting to me in the sky. A week does not pass that I don't catch something anomalous in one or several of the photos. I am sending the untouched original and an enhanced photo. The camera was pointed in a NE direction.I have caught this particular object a couple of times previous to this report and one was on a clear day with no clouds and no airplane activity.
Summary: Taking pictures of sky activity and found this in the photo.
trends: There have been 6 other sightings in Ogden
There were no other sightings in Ogden on or around February 10th 2006
This sighting has never been favorited.
